entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Pelican Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Island Falls 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
